overview: Donbass. Yesterday, Today, and Tomorrow takes a look back at events that unfolded before the start of the crisis in 2014. Historians and journalists share their views on the conflict, players and motives, while ordinary citizens from the Donetsk and Lugansk regions describe the horrors of war.
tagline: The history of the Donbass conflict
title: Donbass. Yesterday, Today, and Tomorrow
